fullText: Honest, Reliable Representation at an Affordable Price. Contact Us Schedule a Consultation FollowFollowFollowFollowFollowFollow Raleigh, NC Immigration Lawyers Attorneys for Personal Injury, Criminal Defense, and Workers’ Compensation in Smithfield and Wake County At the Vasquez Law Firm, PLLC, our experienced lawyers recognize how frightening and intimidating it can be when you are facing a complicated legal matter. In such a situation, the stakes are often extremely high, and a single error along the way could have disastrous effects for you and your family. Whether you have been charged with a crime or you have been injured as the result of another’s negligence, the outcome of your case could affect the rest of your life. For nearly a decade, the attorneys at our law firm have offered top-quality legal services to individuals and families in Wake County, Johnston County, and throughout North Carolina. We provide trusted guidance and skilled representation to those dealing with challenging immigration concerns, as well as clients facing criminal charges. Our team also helps injured accident victims seek the compensation to which they are entitled under the law. In every situation, we work hard on our clients’ behalf to protect their best interests, regardless of the obstacles and difficulties that may arise. Read More Video Gallery Practice Areas The skilled lawyers at Vasquez Law Firm, PLLC have over 35 years of combined legal experience in a wide range of practice areas. With our background and knowledge of the law, we are equipped to help you and your family obtain the best possible outcome for your unique circumstances. When you choose our firm to assist you, you get more than a lawyer. You get an entire team of professionals dedicated to serving your best interests and who will remain at your side every step of the way. Immigration Criminal Defense Workers' Compensation Deportation Defense All Practice Areas Immigration Criminal Defense Worker's Compensation Deportation Defense Personal Injury All Practice Areas Immigration Each year, tens of thousands of foreign citizens come to the United States for a variety of reasons. Countless more are placed on waiting lists to get the visas they need to enter the U.S. legally. If you are looking to immigrate to the United States or to facilitate legal entry for a family member, you need an experienced advocate on your side to help you navigate the U.S. immigration system. The immigration laws of the U.S. are notoriously complicated and unforgiving, but our attorneys are well-versed in the required processes and policies. At Vasquez Law Firm, PLLC, we understand the challenges that immigrants and their families often face as they look to build new lives in the United States. With this in mind, we will work with you from the very beginning to analyze your needs and to identify the documents you will need to reach your goals. We will also help you prepare the necessary applications and supporting documentation to give you the best chance of having your petition approved. Our goal to help you and your family enjoy the opportunities and freedoms that come with living in the United States. Read More Types of Family Visas Types of Family Visas There are many different types of visas available to allow legal entry into the United States. The majority of visas granted in an average year are issued to family members of U.S. citizens and lawful permanent residents. The specific type of visa required for a given situation will depend on the status of the immigrant’s sponsor and their family relationship. Our lawyers will help determine the right visa to meet your needs. Immediate Relative Visas Family Preferences Visas Finance K Visa The Visa Process Knowing which visa you need is just the first step. From there, the real work begins. Our attorneys will assist you in preparing the necessary applications and petitions, as well as providing the necessary documentation to support your request. When a visa becomes available, the prospective immigrant will generally need to participate in an immigration interview before the visa is granted. We will help you meet all of the requirements set forth by U.S. immigration laws so that your loved one can get a visa as quickly as possible. Read More Personal Injury Have you been injured in an accident caused by another person’s negligence, carelessness, or recklessness? If so, the attorney at the Vasquez Law Firm, PLLC are prepared to help you seek full compensation for the injuries you have suffered. We handle a full range of personal injury matters, from car accidents to slip-and-fall accidents and much more. Contact us today, and we will go to work on your behalf. Read More Workers’ Compensation When you are injured on the job in North Carolina, you are generally eligible for benefits under the state’s workers’ compensation system. Unfortunately, getting those benefits is not always as easy as it should be. At our firm, we can help you work around stubborn employers and tight-fisted insurance companies to get you the full benefits promised under the law. Read More Criminal Defense At the Vasquez Law Firm, PLLC, our attorneys know that a conviction on any type of criminal charge can have a dramatic impact on your life. In addition to penalties such as incarceration, probation, and fines, you will also have a criminal record that could follow you for many years to come. When you have been charged with a crime, you need a lawyer who will fight tenaciously to protect your best interests. At our firm, that is what we do. We have helped many clients successfully defend against a wide range of criminal charges, and we are ready to do the same for you. Drug Cases DWI Domestic Violence Traffic Offenses Read More Family Law Disputes related to divorce and other family concerns are some of the most difficult in any area of the law. The intensely personal nature of such matters and their far-reaching consequences make it understandable that you might be feeling overwhelmed and anxious if you are facing such a dispute. At the Vasquez Law Firm, PLLC, our attorneys handle all types of family law cases, including divorce, child custody proceedings, alimony, and separation agreements. We also assist with post-divorce order modifications and enforcement, as well as protective orders for victims of domestic violence. At our firm, you are our top priority, and we know what is at stake for you and your family. Our attorneys will work hard to get you the best possible outcome for your case, no matter how challenging or difficult the situation may be. Read More I received a speeding ticket in NC but I live in Florida. The Vasquez Law Firm did an outstanding job of helping me understand the process, representing me, and communicating with me. Great people! Great results! They made this a painless (actually enjoyable) experience. Rates are VERY reasonable. I received a speeding ticket in NC but I live in Florida. The Vasquez Law Firm did an outstanding job of helping me understand the process, representing me, and communicating with me. Great people! Great results! They made this a painless (actually enjoyable) experience. Rates are VERY reasonable. mainEntity.name: How long does the immigration process take?

acceptedAnswer.text: Immigration timelines vary greatly depending on your case type. Green card applications can take 8-33 months, while citizenship typically takes 8-12 months. Contact Vasquez Law Firm for a personalized timeline assessment.

mainEntity.name: Do I need an immigration lawyer?

acceptedAnswer.text: While not required, an immigration lawyer significantly improves your chances of success. Immigration law is complex and constantly changing. Our attorneys at Vasquez Law Firm ensure your application is complete and accurate.

mainEntity.name: How much does an immigration lawyer cost in Charlotte?

acceptedAnswer.text: Immigration attorney fees vary by case complexity. Vasquez Law Firm offers competitive rates and payment plans. Call 1-844-YO-PELEO for a free consultation and fee quote.
